cores
Interface Core

All Known Implementing Classes:
ProgramCore
public interface Core

This is an interface which acts as a middleman for the outer parts of the program and the core of the program

Author:
Niels Thykier, Frederik Nordahl Sabroe, Morten SÃ¸rensen

findCourse

Course findCourse(java.lang.String courseID)
                  throws CourseDoesNotExistException
Look up a course by a course ID in the database.

Parameters:
courseID - the ID of the course to find
Returns:
the Course with that ID.
Throws:
CourseDoesNotExistException - Thrown if no course has that ID.

addCourseToStudyPlan

void addCourseToStudyPlan(java.lang.String courseID,
                          int semester)
                          throws ConflictingCourseInStudyPlanException,
                                 CourseDoesNotExistException,
                                 java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                 StudyPlanDoesNotExistException,
                                 CourseAlreadyExistsException,
                                 CourseIsMissingDependenciesException,
                                 CourseCannotStartInThisSemesterException
Adds the Course to the current StudyPlan

Parameters:
courseID - The ID of the course to be added.
semester - The semester the course should be added too.
Throws:
CourseDoesNotExistException - Thrown if no course had that course ID.
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if semester is less than 0 or greater than 20
CourseAlreadyExistsException - Thrown if the course is already in the StudyPlan.
ConflictingCourseInStudyPlanException - Thrown if the course to be added have at least one matching skema data with a course on the same semester as the course to be added.
StudyPlanDoesNotExistException - Thrown if the StudyPlan related to studentID does not exist.
CourseIsMissingDependenciesException - Thrown if the course being added has unmet dependencies.
CourseCannotStartInThisSemesterException - Thrown if the course being added cannot start in that semester.
See Also:
addCourseToStudyPlan(java.lang.String, dataClass.SelectedCourse)

addCourseToStudyPlan

void addCourseToStudyPlan(Course course,
                          int semester)
                          throws CourseAlreadyExistsException,
                                 ConflictingCourseInStudyPlanException,
                                 java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                 StudyPlanDoesNotExistException,
                                 CourseIsMissingDependenciesException,
                                 CourseCannotStartInThisSemesterException
Adds the Course to the current StudyPlan

Parameters:
course - The course to be added.
semester - The semester the course should be added too.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if semester is less than 0 or greater than 20
CourseAlreadyExistsException - Thrown if the course is already in the StudyPlan.
ConflictingCourseInStudyPlanException - Thrown if the course to be added have at least one matching skema data with a course on the same semester as the course to be added.
StudyPlanDoesNotExistException - Thrown if the StudyPlan related to studentID does not exist.
CourseIsMissingDependenciesException - Thrown if the course being added has unmet dependencies.
CourseCannotStartInThisSemesterException - Thrown if the course being added cannot start in that semester.
See Also:

addCourseToStudyPlan

void addCourseToStudyPlan(SelectedCourse course)
                          throws CourseAlreadyExistsException,
                                 ConflictingCourseInStudyPlanException,
                                 StudyPlanDoesNotExistException,
                                 CourseIsMissingDependenciesException,
                                 CourseCannotStartInThisSemesterException
Adds the course to the current StudyPlan.

Parameters:
course - The course to be added.
Throws:
CourseAlreadyExistsException - Thrown if the course is already in the StudyPlan.
ConflictingCourseInStudyPlanException - Thrown if the course to be added have at least one matching skema data with a course on the same semester as the course to be added.
StudyPlanDoesNotExistException - Thrown if the StudyPlan related to studentID does not exist.
CourseIsMissingDependenciesException - Thrown if the course being added has unmet dependencies.
CourseCannotStartInThisSemesterException - Thrown if the course being added cannot start in the semester it wants to.

addCourseToStudyPlan

void addCourseToStudyPlan(java.lang.String studentID,
                          java.lang.String courseID,
                          int semester)
                          throws ConflictingCourseInStudyPlanException,
                                 CourseDoesNotExistException,
                                 java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                 StudyPlanDoesNotExistException,
                                 CourseAlreadyExistsException,
                                 CourseIsMissingDependenciesException,
                                 CourseCannotStartInThisSemesterException
Adds a Course to a StudyPlan on a given semester

Parameters:
studentID - the student ID of the student, who's plan it should be added to.
courseID - The ID of the course to be added.
semester - The semester the course should be added too.
Throws:
CourseDoesNotExistException - Thrown if no course had that course ID.
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if semester is less than 0 or greater than 20
CourseAlreadyExistsException - Thrown if the course is already in the StudyPlan.
ConflictingCourseInStudyPlanException - Thrown if the course to be added have at least one matching skema data with a course on the same semester as the course to be added.
StudyPlanDoesNotExistException - Thrown if the StudyPlan related to studentID does not exist.
CourseIsMissingDependenciesException - Thrown if the course being added has unmet dependencies.
CourseCannotStartInThisSemesterException - Thrown if the course being added cannot start in that semester.
See Also:
addCourseToStudyPlan(java.lang.String, dataClass.SelectedCourse)

Throws:

                          SelectedCourse course)
                          throws CourseAlreadyExistsException,
                                 ConflictingCourseInStudyPlanException,
                                 StudyPlanDoesNotExistException,
                                 CourseIsMissingDependenciesException,
                                 CourseCannotStartInThisSemesterException
Adds a SelectedCourse to a StudyPlan.

Parameters:
studentID - the student ID of the student, who's plan it should be added to.
course - The course to be added.
Throws:
CourseAlreadyExistsException - Thrown if the course is already in the StudyPlan.
ConflictingCourseInStudyPlanException - Thrown if the course to be added have at least one matching skema data with a course on the same semester as the course to be added.
StudyPlanDoesNotExistException - Thrown if the StudyPlan related to studentID does not exist.
CourseIsMissingDependenciesException - Thrown if the course being added has unmet dependencies.
CourseCannotStartInThisSemesterException - Thrown if the course being added cannot start in the semester it wants to.

getStudyPlan

StudyPlan getStudyPlan()
Get the current StudyPlan. There will always be a "current" StudyPlan, though it may be unnamed.

Returns:
the StudyPlan

getStudyPlan

StudyPlan getStudyPlan(java.lang.String studentID)
                       throws StudyPlanDoesNotExistException
Get the StudyPlan related to the studentID

Parameters:
studentID - the studentID related to the plan
Returns:
the StudyPlan
Throws:
StudyPlanDoesNotExistException - thrown if the StudyPlan does not exist.

getStudyPlan

StudyPlan getStudyPlan(java.lang.String studentID,
                       boolean createNewIfNotExists)
                       throws StudyPlanDoesNotExistException
Get the StudyPlan related to the studentID

Parameters:
studentID - the studentID related to the plan
createNewIfNotExists - if true, the core will generate the StudyPlan rather than throwing an exception, if it does not exist.
Returns:
the StudyPlan
Throws:
StudyPlanDoesNotExistException - thrown if the createNewIfNotExists is false and the StudyPlan does not exist.

removeCourseFromStudyPlan

boolean removeCourseFromStudyPlan(java.lang.String studentID,
                                  java.lang.String courseID)
                                  throws CourseDoesNotExistException,
                                         StudyPlanDoesNotExistException,
                                         java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                         AnotherCourseDependsOnThisCourseException
Remove a course from a StudyPlan

Parameters:
studentID - the unique identifier of the StudyPlan
courseID - the ID of the course to look for.
Returns:
true if the course was in the list.
Throws:
CourseDoesNotExistException - Thrown if no such course exists (either in general or in the StudyPlan)
StudyPlanDoesNotExistException - Thrown if no StudyPlan with that identifier existed.
AnotherCourseDependsOnThisCourseException
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

removeCourseFromStudyPlan

boolean removeCourseFromStudyPlan(java.lang.String studentID,
                                  Course course)
                                  throws CourseDoesNotExistException,
                                         StudyPlanDoesNotExistException,
                                         java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                         AnotherCourseDependsOnThisCourseException
Remove a course from a StudyPlan

Parameters:
studentID - the unique identifier of the StudyPlan
course - to look for.
Returns:
true if the course was in the list.
Throws:
CourseDoesNotExistException - Thrown if no such course existed in the StudyPlan
StudyPlanDoesNotExistException - Thrown if no StudyPlan with that identifier existed.
AnotherCourseDependsOnThisCourseException
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

removeCourseFromStudyPlan

boolean removeCourseFromStudyPlan(java.lang.String courseID)
                                  throws CourseDoesNotExistException,
                                         StudyPlanDoesNotExistException,
                                         java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                         AnotherCourseDependsOnThisCourseException
Remove a course from the current StudyPlan

Parameters:
courseID - the ID of the course to look for.
Returns:
true if the course was in the list.
Throws:
CourseDoesNotExistException - Thrown if no such course exists (either in general or in the StudyPlan)
StudyPlanDoesNotExistException - Thrown if a StudyPlan with that studentID did not exist
AnotherCourseDependsOnThisCourseException - Thrown if another course depends on the course that was to be removed.
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if the ID of the course would cause the Course(String, String) constructor to fail.
See Also:
Course.Course(String, String)

removeCourseFromStudyPlan

boolean removeCourseFromStudyPlan(Course course)
                                  throws CourseDoesNotExistException,
                                         StudyPlanDoesNotExistException,
                                         AnotherCourseDependsOnThisCourseException
Remove a course from the current StudyPlan

Parameters:
course - to look for.
Returns:
true if the course was in the list.
Throws:
CourseDoesNotExistException - Thrown if no such course existed in the StudyPlan
StudyPlanDoesNotExistException - Thrown if no StudyPlan with that identifier existed.
AnotherCourseDependsOnThisCourseException - Thrown if another course depends on the course that was to be removed.

saveStudyPlanAs

void saveStudyPlanAs(java.lang.String studentID,
                     java.lang.String newName)
                     throws CannotSaveStudyPlanException,
                            FilePermissionException,
                            StudyPlanDoesNotExistException
Saves a StudyPlan under a different name

Parameters:
studentID - this is the student ID
newName - this is the filename the user wants to save as
Throws:
CannotSaveStudyPlanException - Thrown if the studyplan could not be saved
FilePermissionException - Thrown if the user does not have the permissions required to write to the file
StudyPlanDoesNotExistException - Thrown if the studyplan does not exist

saveStudyPlanAs

void saveStudyPlanAs(StudyPlan plan,
                     java.lang.String newName)
                     throws CannotSaveStudyPlanException,
                            FilePermissionException
Saves a StudyPlan under a different name

Parameters:
plan - This is the studyplan
newName - This is the name of the file the use wants to save the studyplan to
Throws:
CannotSaveStudyPlanException - Thrown if the studyplan could not be saved
FilePermissionException - Thrown if the user does not have the permissions required to write to the file

Saves a StudyPlan

studentID - This is the students ID

FilePermissionException - Thrown if the user does not have the permissions required to write to the file
StudyPlanDoesNotExistException - Thrown if the studyplan does not exist

                   throws CannotSaveStudyPlanException,
                          FilePermissionException
Saves a StudyPlan

Parameters:
plan - This is the Studyplan
Throws:
CannotSaveStudyPlanException - Thrown if the studyplan could not be saved
FilePermissionException - Thrown if the user does not have the permissions required to write to the file

loadStudyPlan

StudyPlan loadStudyPlan(java.lang.String studentID)
                        throws FilePermissionException,
                               java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                               java.io.IOException,
                               CorruptStudyPlanFileException
Load a saved StudyPlan

Parameters:
studentID - the unique Identifier of the of the StudyPlan (or the filename of it without a .plan extension)
Returns:
the StudyPlan.
Throws:
FilePermissionException - Thrown if required File Permissions for the file was missing.
java.io.FileNotFoundException - Thrown if no file could be found (determined from the studentID).
java.io.IOException - If internal read errors happened.
CorruptStudyPlanFileException - Thrown if the file could be found, but the data was not understandable.

isCourseInStudyPlan

boolean isCourseInStudyPlan(java.lang.String studentID,
                            Course course)
                            throws StudyPlanDoesNotExistException
Check if a course has already been added to a StudyPlan

Parameters:
studentID - the student ID (or unique identifier) of the StudyPlan
course - the Course to check for.
Returns:
true if the Course is already in the plan.
Throws:
StudyPlanDoesNotExistException - Thrown if the StudyPlan did not exist

isCourseInStudyPlan

boolean isCourseInStudyPlan(java.lang.String studentID,
                            java.lang.String courseID)
                            throws StudyPlanDoesNotExistException
Check if a course has already been added to a StudyPlan

Parameters:
studentID - the student ID (or unique identifier) of the StudyPlan
courseID - the ID number of the Course to check for.
Returns:
true if the Course is already in the plan.
Throws:
StudyPlanDoesNotExistException - Thrown if the StudyPlan did not exist

isValidCourse

boolean isValidCourse(java.lang.String courseID)
Test if a course ID is a valid course.

Parameters:
courseID - the Course ID to look up
Returns:
true if such a course exists and all mandatory data for it can be found.

search

Course[] search(java.lang.String pattern)
                throws CourseDoesNotExistException
Search through the Course data files for a pattern (this can be a regular expression).

Parameters:
pattern - searches for a pattern.
Returns:
returns an array of courses which (somehow) matches this pattern.
Throws:
CourseDoesNotExistException - thrown if no courses match the pattern.
